name: flownote
title: FlowNote
description: Takes voice notes, transcribes and cleans them, and uploads them to Notion
author: cristopher_yates

preferences.name: ffmpegPath
preferences.title: FFmpeg Path
preferences.description: Absolute path to the ffmpeg binary (e.g., /opt/homebrew/bin/ffmpeg)

preferences.name: micDeviceIndex
preferences.title: Mic Device Index
preferences.description: AVFoundation input device index for your microphone (e.g., :0 or :1)

preferences.name: openaiApiKey
preferences.title: OpenAI API Key
preferences.description: Your OpenAI API key for transcription and text processing

preferences.name: notionToken
preferences.title: Notion Integration Token
preferences.description: Your Notion internal integration token (kept secure)

preferences.name: notionDatabaseId
preferences.title: Notion Database ID
preferences.description: The ID of the Notion database where notes will be added

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
